modName: Lakeview Exterior Collision Markers Fix - Hearthfire
summary:
Ever notice your npcs refuse to walk past your Lakeview Manor, even though there is plenty of room?
This removes unnecessary collision markers around the Lakeview Manor so your npcs can walk past your house with certain wing builds.
descriptionHtml:
[color=YELLOW][b]!! Make sure your lakeview manor is completely build with the upgrades you want to have (through workbenches and steward) before activating this mod !!
!! If you start a new game or switch character you need to deactivate the mod until the manor is build !![/b][/color]
This mod is not advised for people who like to change between characters all the time, unless their lakeview manor has the exact same wing buildings on each game.
[u]Requires Hearthfire DLC[/u]
Nexus Exclusive Mod -- Do NOT upload this file to other sites.

My main mod: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31380/?]Lakeview Extended - Hearthfire[/url]

[color=ORANGE][b]~~~~~~Intro:~~~~~~~~~~~[/b][/color]
Ever notice your npcs refuse to walk past your Lakeview Manor, even though there is plenty of room?
This removes unnecessary collision markers around the Lakeview Manor so your npcs can walk past your house with certain wing builds, install only one .esp per wing.
Contains six different .esp files to choose from, two for each wing, only one for each wing should be used!
Example: I build the kitchen yet the armory collision marker is there thus my npcs will not walk past, to fix this I install the "Lakeview_Extended_CM_EastWingKitchen.esp" for the east wing only.
If you start a new game you need to re-choose the right esps appropriate for your new wings after the manor is build.

This does not affect your spouse, if he/she stand somewhere all day long its because of a hearthfire bug and even this mod cannot fix that.

[color=ORANGE][b]~~~~~~Installation:~~~~~~[/b][/color]
* Always make back-up saves before trying new mods.
* Make sure you are far away from Lakeview manor before installing.
* Manual: open the 7zip file, then drag and drop the appropriate .ESP files into Skyrim's Data folder.

[color=ORANGE][b]~~~~~~Uninstallation:~~~~[/b][/color]
* Make sure you are far away from Lakeview manor before uninstalling, wait 40+ days.
* Manually delete the mod.

[color=ORANGE][b]~~~~~~Extra:~~~~~~~~~~~~[/b][/color]
* To let [b]wait time[/b] go faster, open console and type "TFC", one day will pass in a second now instead of waiting for every single hour to pass, when done type "TFC" again.


[color=#f9cb9c][size=1]Disclaimer:
In case Nexus website shuts down and/or I am no longer around, then you can upload/convert this mod to other websites for the purpose of FREE redistribution. (never charge money for it)
Though you must credit me as the original author and I will always retain all rights[color=#f9cb9c][size=1] and permissions[/size][/color] to this mod.[/size][/color]
author: Ac3s
